blocklist.title: Blocklist
blocklist.explanation: Blocked users cannot follow you, invite you, or apply to your games/campaigns. You can unblock them at any time.

descriptions.profile_name: This name is public and must be unique. Use letters, numbers, periods, underscores, or hyphens.
descriptions.profile_name_public: This name is public and visible to other players.
descriptions.availability: Set your weekly availability for gaming sessions
descriptions.languages: Languages you feel comfortable using to play
descriptions.identity_tags: Help others find compatible gaming partners
descriptions.availability_calendar: Click and drag to select your available time slots each week.
descriptions.identity_tags_help: Help others find compatible gaming partners

additional.title: Additional Information
additional.description: More details about your gaming preferences and experience
